scripts.test:allure: RUN_ID=$(date +%Y-%m-%d_%H-%M-%S) && playwright test && mkdir -p allure-history/$RUN_ID && npx allure generate ./allure-results --clean -o allure-history/$RUN_ID && (cd allure-history/$RUN_ID && python3 -m http.server 5050 & sleep 2 && xdg-open http://localhost:5050)
scripts.allure:open: npx allure generate ./allure-results --clean -o allure-report && (cd allure-report && python3 -m http.server 5050 & sleep 2 && xdg-open http://localhost:5050)
